Interface Tx_Extbase_Persistence_ValueFactoryInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:

Tx_Extbase_Persistence_ValueFactory
public interface Tx_Extbase_Persistence_ValueFactoryInterface

The ValueFactory object provides methods for the creation Value objects that can then be used to set properties.
